original: 開疆拓土當急農，大軍無糧，何談爭鋒天下？小的恰好有一批耕牛和犁具，需三千金錢，不知大人是否有意收購？
text: Open the frontier and expand the land to be an urgent farmer, and the army has no food. How can you talk about fighting for the world? The small one happened to have a group of cattle and plows, which required three thousand dollars. I wonder if the adults intend to buy them?
